samples.title: Create a Word AI-Assistant Add-in
samples.shortDescription: A word add in interact with AI service and word document
samples.fullDescription: This add-in demonstrates Word add-in capabilities to insert content generated by AI or edited manually into Document Comment Footnote and Header. There're two mode: chat mode and predefined prompt prefix to generate text/picture.

samples.shortDescription: A word add in interact with AI service and word document
samples.fullDescription: This add-in demonstrates Word add-in capabilities to insert content generated by AI or edited manually into Document Comment Footnote and Header. There're two mode: chat mode and predefined prompt prefix to generate text/picture.
